title:
The city is putting up a new stoplight at the intersection of Pine Grove Drive & Beasley Road.

Why??

1. 900 cars a day on Beasley Vs. 20 times that many on Pine Grove.

2. You can throw a rock from the new stoplight & hit the light at Holly Tree & Pine Grove/

3.A Traffic bottleneck was just eliminated down Pine Grove & the intersection of Pine Grove/Masonboro loop & Masonboro Sound Roads.

Why are you creating a new bottleneck for Pine Grove??
